issue.title: [Python] Build manylinux1 docker image directly in the CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of always waiting for `quay.io` on PRs, we should built the docker image in the Travis job. We will still pull the current image from `quay.io` to profit from the layer caching.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3944?focusedCommentId=16714027) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
It's not feasible to build all dependencies in the CI sadly. They take too much time.
